alert.note: Alert for Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:30AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, southeastern Bucks and northern Philadelphia Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 530 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jenkintown, or near Philadelphia, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Bensalem, Florence, Burlington, Bristol, Hatboro, Jenkintown, Beverly, Rockledge, Newtown, Tullytown, Abington, Langhorne, Bryn Athyn, Feasterville-Trevose, Willow Grove, Florence-Roebling, Northeast Philadelphia, Feasterville and Tacony. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 6A. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 343 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 32 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
